sentences.text: Proxy Statement For 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: February 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thomas J. Falk Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FELLOW STOCKHOLDERS:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is my pleasure to invite you to the Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Kimberly-Clark Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The meeting will be held on Thursday, April 20, 2017, at 9:30 a.m. at the Four Seasons Resort and Club, which is located at 4150 North MacArthur Boulevard, Irving, Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Annual Meeting, stockholders will be asked to elect thirteen directors for a one-year term, ratify the selection of Kimberly-Clarks independent auditors, approve the compensation for our named executive officers, and approve the frequency of future stockholder votes on our named executive officers compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These matters are fully described in the accompanying Notice of Annual Meeting and proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regardless of whether you plan to attend the meeting, I urge you to vote your shares as soon as possible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote using the proxy form by completing, signing, and dating it, then returning it by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, most of our stockholders can submit their vote by telephone or through the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If telephone or Internet voting is available to you, instructions will be included on your proxy form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information about voting your shares is included in the proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting of Stockholders of Kimberly-Clark Corporation will be held at the Four Seasons Resort and Club, which is located at 4150 North MacArthur Boulevard, Irving, Texas, on Thursday, April 20, 2017, at 9:30 a.m. for the following purposes:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To elect as directors the thirteen nominees named in the accompanying proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ratify the selection of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent auditors for 2017;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: TO BE HELD April 2
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To approve the compensation for our named executive officers in an advisory vote; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To approve the frequency of future stockholder votes on our named executive officers compensation in an advisory vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AT Four Seasons Resort and Club 4150 North MacArthur Boulevard, Irving,Texas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders also will take action upon any other business that may properly come before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders of record at the close of business on February 21, 2017 are entitled to notice of and to vote at the meeting or any adjournments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is important that your shares be represented at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I urge you to vote promptly by using the Internet or telephone or by signing, dating and returning your proxy form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The accompanying proxy statement also is being used to solicit voting instructions for shares of Kimberly-Clark common stock that are held by the trustees of our employee benefit and stock purchase plans for the benefit of the participants in the plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is important that participants in the plans indicate their preferences by using the Internet or telephone or by signing, dating and returning the voting instruction card, which is enclosed with the proxy statement, in the business reply envelope provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To attend in person, please register by following the instructions on page 10.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: February 27, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Performance and Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Management Development and Compensation Committee of our Board concluded that Kimberly-Clarks management delivered financial performance in 2016 that was slightly above target from an overall perspective, as reflected in the financial metrics of our annual incentive program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance Measures      2016 Results      2016 Target       Net sales   $18.20 billion   $18.20 billion   Adjusted EPS  $6.03 $6.05 Adjusted OPROS improvement  +110 bps   +70 bps Adjusted EPS is adjusted earnings per share and Adjusted OPROS is adjusted operating profit return on sales.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For details on how these measures are adjusted, see Compensation Discussion and Analysis - Executive Compensation for 2016, 2016 Performance Goals, Performance Assessments and Payouts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this performance, the Committee approved annual cash incentives for 2016 slightly above the target amount, including an annual incentive payout for our Chief Executive Officer of 109 percent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The chart at left shows the Total Shareholder Return for Kimberly- Clark, our Executive Compensation Peer Group (taken as a whole) and the S&P 500 for the previous five years, which reflects the value returned to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we took the following new governance actions:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: added Christa S. Quarles, Chief Executive Officer of OpenTable, to our Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: elected Michael D. Hsu to the role of President and Chief Operating Officer as part of a long-term succession planning process, and appointed Mr. Hsu to our Board of Directors,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopted outside board service limits providing that our non-employee directors may not serve on more than five public company boards (including Kimberly-Clarks board) and members of our Audit Committee may not serve on the audit committees of more than three public companies (including Kimberly-Clarks), and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: adopted a board succession planning policy which formalizes the Boards commitment to reviewing the composition of the Board and refreshing the Board as appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Corporate Governance section beginning on page 11 describes our governance framework, which includes the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Profile Independent Lead Director       Stockholders Have Right to Call Special Meetings Independent Board Committees Proxy Access Rights Annual Board and Committee Evaluations   Stockholder Engagement Policy and Robust Outreach Program Annually Elected Directors Anti-Hedging and Pledging Policy Independent Directors Meet Without Management Present Stock Ownership Guidelines for Directors and Executive Officers Robust Succession Planning and Risk Oversight Outside Director Restricted Stock Unit Awards Not Paid Out Until Retirement Majority Voting in Director Elections Code of Conduct for Directors, Officers and Employees

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information About Our Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On behalf of the Board of Directors of Kimberly-Clark Corporation, we are soliciting your proxy for use at the 2017 Annual Meeting of Stockholders, to be held on April 20, 2017, at 9:30 a.m. at the Four Seasons Resort and Club, which is located at 4150 North MacArthur Boulevard, Irving, Texas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We began providing our proxy statement and form of proxy to stockholders on February 27, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules permit, we are making our proxy statement and our annual report available to many of our stockholders via the Internet rather than by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This reduces printing and delivery costs and supports our sustainability efforts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may have received in the mail a Notice of Electronic Availability explaining how to access this proxy statement and our annual report on the Internet and how to vote online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received this Notice but would like to receive a paper copy of the proxy materials, you should follow the instructions contained in the notice for requesting these materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you were a stockholder of record at the close of business on the record date of February 21, 2017, you are eligible to vote at the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share that you own entitles you to one vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: of the record date, 355,750,882 shares of our common stock were outstanding
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote in person by attending the meeting, by using the Internet or telephone, or (if you received printed proxy materials) by completing and returning a proxy form by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If telephone or Internet voting is available to you, see the instructions on the notice of electronic availability or the proxy form and have the notice or proxy form available when you access the Internet website or place your telephone call.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To vote your proxy by mail, mark your vote on the proxy form, then follow the instructions on the card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please note that if you received a notice of electronic availability as described above, you cannot vote your shares by filling out and returning the notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead, you should follow the instructions contained in the notice on how to vote by using the Internet or telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information About Our Annual Meeting How Abstentions will be Counted
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The named proxies will vote your shares according to your directions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The voting results will be certified by independent Inspectors of Election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you sign and return your proxy form, or if you vote using the Internet or by telephone, but you do not specify how you want to vote your shares, the named proxies will vote your shares as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of directors named in this proxy statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR ratification of the selection of our independent auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR approval of the compensation of our named executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the option of every one year as the frequency with which stockholders are provided future advisory votes on the compensation of our named executive officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are several ways to revoke or change your vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail a revised proxy form to the Corporate Secretary of Kimberly-Clark (the form must be received before the meeting starts).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use the following address: 351 Phelps Drive, Irving, TX 75038
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use the Internet voting website
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Use the telephone voting procedures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attend the meeting and vote in person
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Votes  Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There must be a quorum to conduct business at the Annual Meeting, which is established by having a majority of the shares of our common stock present in person or represented by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director nominee will be elected if he or she receives a majority of the votes cast at the meeting in person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any nominee does not receive a majority of the votes cast, then that nominee will be subject to the Boards policy regarding resignations by directors who do not receive a majority of for votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Say on Frequency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The option receiving the greatest number of votes will be considered the frequency recommended by the stockholders for future say-on-pay votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Proposals or Matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval requires the affirmative vote of a majority of shares that are present at the Annual Meeting in person or by proxy and are entitled to vote on the proposal or matter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How  Abstentions  will be  Counted
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will have no impact on the outcome of the vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will not be counted for the purpose of determining the number of votes cast or as votes for or against a nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other Proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions will be counted:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as present in determining whether we have a quorum
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in determining the total number of shares entitled to vote on a proposal
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: as votes against a proposal, except for abstentions on Proposal 4, which will have no impact on the outcome of the vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information About Our Annual Meeting Costs of Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effect of Not  Instructing  Your Broker
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Routine Matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held through a broker and you do not instruct the broker on how to vote your shares, your broker may choose to leave your shares unvoted or to vote your shares on routine matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of Auditors is the only routine matter on the agenda at this years Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-Routine Matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without instructions, your broker cannot vote your shares on non-routine matters, resulting in what are known as broker non-votes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will not be considered present or entitled to vote on non-routine matters and will also not be counted for the purpose of determining the number of votes cast on these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you participate in our Direct Stock Purchase and Dividend Reinvestment Plan, you will receive a proxy form that represents the number of full shares in your plan account plus any other shares registered in your name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no special instructions for voting shares held in the plan; simply use the normal voting methods described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are also sending or otherwise making this proxy statement and voting materials available to participants who hold Kimberly-Clark stock through any of our employee benefit and stock purchase plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The trustee of each plan will vote whole shares of stock attributable to each participants interest in the plans in accordance with the participants directions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a participant gives no directions, the plan committee will direct the voting of his or her shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Attending  the Annual  Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are eligible to vote, you or a duly appointed representative may attend the Annual Meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do plan to attend, we ask that you inform us electronically, by telephone, or by checking the appropriate box on your proxy form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This will assist us with meeting preparations and help to expedite your admittance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are not registered in your own name and you would like to attend the meeting, please ask the broker, trust, bank or other nominee that holds your shares to provide you with written proof of your share ownership as of the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This will enable you to gain admission to the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you need directions to the meeting, please contact Stockholder Services by telephone at (972) 281-5317 or by e-mail at stockholders@kcc.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Costs of  Solicitation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kimberly-Clark will bear all costs of this proxy solicitation, including the cost of preparing, printing and delivering materials, the cost of the proxy solicitation and the expenses of brokers, fiduciaries and other nominees who forward proxy materials to stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to mail and electronic means, our employees may solicit proxies by telephone or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have retained D. F. King & Co., Inc. to aid in the solicitation at a cost of approximately $20,000 plus reimbursement of out- of-pocket expenses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance structure and processes are based on a number of important governance documents including our Code of Conduct, Certificate of Incorporation, Corporate By-Laws, Corporate Governance Policies and our Board Committee Charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These documents, which are available in the Investors section of our website at www.kimberly-clark.com, guide the Board and our management in the execution of their responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kimberly-Clark believes that there is a direct connection between good corporate governance and long-term, sustained business success, and we believe it is important to uphold sound governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, the Board reviews its governance practices and documents on an ongoing basis, considering changing regulatory requirements, governance trends, and issues raised by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After careful evaluation, we may periodically make changes to maintain or enhance current governance practices and promote stockholder value.

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By-Laws provide that a majority of our directors must be independent (Independent Directors).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe our independent board helps ensure good corporate governance and strong internal controls.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Policies, as adopted by the Board, provide independence standards consistent with the rules and regulations of the SEC and the listing standards of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independence standards can be found in Section 7 of our Corporate Governance Policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all directors and nominees, except for Thomas J. Falk and Michael D. Hsu, are Independent Directors and meet the independence standards in our Corporate Governance Policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making these determinations, the Board considered the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Companies majority-owned by Mr. Bergstrom paid us approximately $57,000 in 2014, 2015 and 2016 to lease excess hangar space at an airport near Appleton, Wisconsin and approximately $200,000 in 2014, $205,000 in 2015 and $326,000 in 2016 for pilot services pursuant to a pilot sharing contract.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, these companies paid us approximately $197,000 in 2014, $201,000 in 2015 and $204,000 in 2016 for scheduling and aircraft services for their airplane.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We paid approximately $78,600 in 2014, $8,000 in 2015 and $4,500 in 2016 for automobiles and related services to car dealerships in the Neenah, Wisconsin area that are majority-owned by Mr. Bergstrom.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NYSE listing standards and our own Corporate Governance Policies establish certain levels at which transactions are considered to have the potential to affect a directors independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The transactions listed above all fall below these levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our Corporate Governance Policies, certain relationships were considered immaterial and therefore were not considered by the Board in determining independence.

sentences.text: Roles of the Committee and the CEO and COO in Compensation Decisions Each year, the Committee reviews and sets the compensation of the officers that are elected by the Board (our elected officers), including our Chief Executive Officer and our other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committees charter does not permit the Committee to delegate to anyone the authority to establish any compensation policies or programs for elected officers, including our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to officers that have been appointed to their position (our non- elected officers), our Chief Executive Officer has the authority to establish compensation programs and to approve equity grants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, only the Committee may make grants to elected officers, including our executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chief Executive Officer makes a recommendation to the Committee each year on the appropriate target annual compensation for each of the other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beginning in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017, our Chief Operating Officer makes the recommendation for the executive officers who are his direct reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee makes the final determination of the target annual compensation for each executive officer, including our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Operating Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While our Chief Executive Officer and Chief Human Resources Officer, and beginning in 2017, our Chief Operating Officer, typically attend Committee meetings, none of the other executive officers is present during the portion of the Committees meetings when compensation for executive officers is set.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, neither our Chief Executive Officer nor our Chief Operating Officer is present during the portion of the Committees meetings when his compensation is set.

sentences.text: In 2016, the Committee retained Semler Brossy Consulting Group as its independent executive compensation consultant.

sentences.text: According to the Committees written policy, the independent Committee consultant provides services solely to the Committee and not to Kimberly-Clark.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Semler Brossy reports directly to the Committee, and the Committee may replace it or hire additional consultants at any time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative of Semler Brossy attends Committee meetings and communicates with the Chairman of the Committee between meetings from time to time.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Conducting a review of the competitive market data (including base salary, annual incentive targets and long-term incentive targets) for our executive officers, including our Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Committee Assessment of Consultant Conflicts of Interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has reviewed whether the work provided by Semler Brossy and Mercer represents any conflict of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Factors considered by the Committee include: (1) other services provided to Kimberly-Clark by the consultant; (2) what percentage of the consultants total revenue is made up of fees from Kimberly-Clark; (3) policies or procedures of the consultant that are designed to prevent a conflict of interest; (4) any business or personal relationships between individual consultants involved in the engagement and Committee members; (5) any shares of Kimberly-Clark stock owned by individual consultants involved in the engagement; and (6) any business or personal relationships between our executive officers and the consulting firm or the individual consultants involved in the engagement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on its review, the Committee does not believe that any of the compensation consultants that performed services in 2016 has a conflict of interest with respect to the work performed for Kimberly-Clark or the Committee.

sentences.text: Proxy Access By-Law.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eligible stockholders may nominate candidates for election to the Board under our proxy access By-Law.

sentences.text: The proxy access By-Law permits a stockholder, or a group of up to 20 stockholders, owning three percent or more of our outstanding common stock continuously for at least three years to nominate and include in our proxy materials directors constituting up to two individuals or 20 percent of the Board (whichever is greater).

sentences.text: Special Stockholder Meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Certificate of Incorporation allows the holders of 25 percent or more of our issued and outstanding shares of capital stock to request that a special meeting of stockholders be called, subject to procedures and other requirements set forth in our By-Laws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Policy on Stockholder Rights Plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have a poison pill or stockholder rights plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we were to adopt a stockholder rights plan, the Board would seek prior stockholder approval of the plan unless, due to timing constraints or other reasons, a majority of Independent Directors of the Board determines that it would be in the best interests of stockholders to adopt a plan before obtaining stockholder approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a stockholder rights plan is adopted without prior stockholder approval, the plan must either be ratified by stockholders or must expire, without being renewed or replaced, within one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sustainability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At Kimberly-Clark, everything we do - from helping people care for their families, to helping our communities and caring for our planet - is connected to our vision to lead the world in essentials for a better life.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board has established and approved the framework for our sustainability- related policies and procedures, including environmental stewardship, fiber sourcing, product safety, charitable contributions, human rights, labor, diversity and inclusion in employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of their oversight roles, the Board and the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee receive regular reports from management on these topics, our goals and our progress toward achieving them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2015, we successfully concluded our five-year sustainability goals and introduced five priorities for the next seven years, reflecting the key social and environmental aspects of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These focus areas include social impact, forests and fiber, waste and recycling, energy and climate and responsible supply chain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These priorities reflect our assessment of sustainability-related risks and opportunities and also inform our public disclosure of sustainability performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our management of these focus areas includes processes and systems to mitigate risks and enable compliance with legal requirements and Kimberly-Clark standards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we have established specific goals in each of the focus areas, including for example, greenhouse gas emissions reduction, diversion of pre- and post- consumer waste from landfills and the prevention of forced labor and deforestation in our supply chain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notable sustainability achievements in 2016 include:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Named by CDP (formerly Carbon Disclosure Project) to the Leadership category of companies for Forests, Water, Climate Change, and Supply Chain disclosures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Included in the FTSE4Good Index Series for the 12th consecutive year for excellence in environmental, social, and governance performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Earned an A ranking from MSCI for environmental, social, and governance performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Named to Forbes The Just 100: Americas Best Corporate Citizens
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Won the US Environmental Protection Agencys SmartWay Excellence Award for the 4th
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: consecutive year, recognizing demonstrated leadership in freight supply chain energy and environmental performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Earned a perfect score on the Human Rights Campaign Foundations Corporate Equality Index, covering corporate policies and practices pertinent to lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has adopted Corporate Governance Policies which guide Kimberly-Clark and the Board on matters of corporate governance, including: director responsibilities, Board committees and their charters, director independence, director compensation, performance assessments of the Board and individual directors, Board succession planning, director orientation and education, director access to management, Board access to outside financial, business and legal advisors, management development and succession planning, and Board interaction with stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board monitors emerging issues and amends these policies from time to time as rules and regulations change and governance practices develop.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To see the policies, go to the Investors section of our website at www.kimberly- clark.com.

sentences.text: Board and Committee Evaluations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board conducts annual self-evaluations to determine whether it and its committees are functioning effectively and whether its governing documents continue to remain appropriate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each Board member is periodically evaluated on an individual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The process is designed and overseen by our Lead Director and our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, and the results of the evaluations are discussed by the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee annually reviews its own performance and assesses the adequacy of its charter, and reports the results and any recommendations to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee oversees and reports annually to the Board its assessment of each committees performance evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Succession Planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee maintains and reviews a succession plan for the Board, as described in Proposal 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors - Process and Criteria for Nominating Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Conduct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Kimberly-Clark has a Code of Conduct that applies to all of our directors, executive officers and employees, including our Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer and Vice President and Controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It is available in the Investors section of our website at www.kimberly-clark.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any amendments to or waivers of our Code of Conduct applicable to our Chief Executive Officer, Chief Financial Officer or Vice President and Controller will also be posted at that location.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Management Roles in Risk Oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for providing risk oversight with respect to our operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with this oversight, the Board particularly focuses on our strategic and operational risks, as well as related risk mitigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board reviews and oversees managements response to key risks facing Kimberly-Clark.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards committees review particular risk areas to assist the Board in its overall risk oversight of Kimberly-Clark:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee oversees our risk management program, with a particular focus on our internal controls, compliance programs, financial statement integrity and fraud risks, data privacy and cybersecurity, and related risk mitigation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with this oversight, the Audit Committee receives regular reports from management on risk assessments, the risk management process, and issues related to the risks of managing our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also receives an annual enterprise risk management update, which describes our key financial, strategic, operational and compliance risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Management Development and Compensation Committee reviews the risk profile of our
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: compensation policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process includes a review of an assessment of our compensation programs, as described in Compensation Discussion and Analysis  Analysis of Compensation-Related Risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Corporate Governance Other Corporate Governance Policies and Practices
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee monitors risks relating to governance matters and recommends appropriate actions in response to those risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, it provides oversight of our Corporate Social Responsibility programs and sustainability activities and receives regular updates on the effectiveness of these programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Complementing the Boards overall risk oversight, our senior executive team identifies and monitors key enterprise-wide and business unit risks, providing the basis for the Boards risk review and oversight process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have a Global Risk Oversight Committee, consisting of management members from core business units and from our finance, treasury, global risk management, compliance and legal functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee identifies significant risks for review and updates our policies for risk management in areas such as hedging, foreign currency and country risks, product liability, property and casualty risks, data privacy and cybersecurity risks, and supplier and customer risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes the allocation of risk management responsibilities described above supplements the Boards leadership structure by allocating risk areas to an appropriate committee for oversight, allows for an orderly escalation of issues as necessary, and helps the Board satisfy its risk oversight responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whistleblower Procedures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has established procedures for receiving, recording and addressing any complaints we receive regarding accounting, internal accounting controls or auditing matters, and for the confidential and anonymous submission, by our employees or others, of any concerns about our accounting or auditing practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also maintain a toll-free Code of Conduct telephone helpline and a website, each allowing our employees and others to voice their concerns anonymously.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chief Compliance Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Vice President and Chief Compliance Officer oversees our compliance programs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: His duties include: regularly updating the Audit Committee on the effectiveness of our compliance programs, providing periodic reports to the Board, and working closely with our various compliance functions to promote coordination and sharing of best practices across these functions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Vice President and Chief Compliance Officer is also a member of our Global Risk Oversight Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management Succession Planning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conjunction with the Board, the Management Development and Compensation Committee is responsible for periodically reviewing the long-term management development plans and succession plans for the Chief Executive Officer and other key officers, as well as the emergency succession plan for the Chief Executive Officer and other key officers if any of these officers unexpectedly becomes unable to perform his or her duties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Disclosure Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have established a Disclosure Committee to assist in fulfilling our obligations to maintain disclosure controls and procedures and to coordinate and oversee the process of preparing our periodic securities filings with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This committee is composed of members of management and is chaired by our Vice President and Controller.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No Executive Loans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not extend loans to our executive officers or directors and therefore do not have any such loans outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Charitable Contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee has adopted guidelines for the review and approval of charitable contributions by Kimberly-Clark (or any foundation under the common control of Kimberly-Clark) to organizations or entities with which a director or an executive officer may be affiliated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will disclose in the Investors section of our website at www.kimberly-clark.com any contributions made by us to a tax-exempt organization under the following circumstances:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An Independent Director serves as an executive officer of the tax-exempt organization; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If within the preceding three years, contributions in any single year from Kimberly-Clark to the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: organization exceeded the greater of $1 million or 2 percent of the tax-exempt organizations consolidated gross revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this proxy statement, the Board of Directors consists of thirteen members.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each directors term will expire at this years Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All the nominees standing for election at the Annual Meeting are being nominated to serve until the 2018 Annual Meeting of Stockholders and until their successors have been duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All nominees have advised us that they will serve if elected; however, should any nominee become unable to serve, proxies may be voted for another person designated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Given the independent status of the nominees, if all nominees are elected at the Annual Meeting, eleven of the thirteen directors on our Board will be Independent Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Process for Director Elections
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Certificate of Incorporation provides that all of our directors must be elected annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By- Laws provide that, in uncontested elections, directors must be elected by a majority of votes cast rather than by a plurality.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any incumbent director does not receive a majority of votes, he or she is required to tender his or her resignation for consideration by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Process and Criteria for Nominating Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors is responsible for approving candidates for Board membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Board adopted a Board succession planning policy which formalizes its commitment to refreshing and maintaining a group of directors with diverse perspectives and capabilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that adding fresh perspectives is critical, but also values the institutional knowledge and experience of long-serving directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is committed to balancing these factors through our succession plan, retirement policy and director evaluation process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our succession planning policy, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee maintains and reviews a Board succession plan, taking into account current composition and qualifications, Kimberly-Clarks current and expected needs, director tenure, the effectiveness of the Board and any planned or unplanned vacancies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In consultation with the Chairman of the Board and Chief Executive Officer and the Lead Director, the Committee screens and recruits director candidates and recommends to the Board any new appointments and nominees for election as directors at our annual meeting of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also recommends nominees to fill any vacancies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As provided in our Certificate of Incorporation, the Board of Directors has the authority to determine the size of the Board and to fill any vacancies that occur between annual meetings of stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee may receive recommendations for Board candidates from various sources, including our directors, management and stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee periodically retains a search firm to assist it in identifying and recruiting director candidates meeting the criteria specified by the Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee utilized a search firm in connection with Ms. Quarles nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, as described in Corporate Governance - Stockholder Rights, our By-Laws provide for proxy access stockholder nominations of director candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who wish to nominate directors under our proxy access By- Law should follow the instructions under Other Information - Stockholder Director Nominees for
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Inclusion in Next Years Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders who wish to nominate directors who are not intended to be included in the Corporations proxy materials should follow the instructions under Other Information - Stockholder Director Nominees Not Included in Next Years Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Collaborative
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bring a proactive and solution-oriented approach

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ATTRIBUTE      FACTORS THAT MAY BE CONSIDERED Financial acumen Has good knowledge of business finance and financial statements  Satisfies the financial literacy requirements of the NYSE   Qualifies as an audit committee financial expert under the rules and regulations of the SEC   Has an accounting, finance or banking background General business experience Possesses experience that will aid in judgments concerning business issues Has leadership experience as a chief or senior executive officer   Has experience setting compensation Industry knowledge Possesses knowledge about our industries Has marketing expertise, with digital marketing and e-commerce experience   Has governance/public company board experience Diversity of background and viewpoint Brings to the Board an appropriate level of diversity Brings a diverse viewpoint that is representative of our customer, consumer, employee and stockholder base
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors who are not officers or employees of Kimberly-Clark or any of our subsidiaries, affiliates or equity companies are Outside Directors for compensation purposes and are compensated for their services under our 2011 Outside Directors Compensation Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Independent Directors currently on our Board are Outside Directors and are compensated under this Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our objectives for Outside Director Compensation are:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to remain competitive with the median compensation paid to outside directors of comparable companies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to keep pace with changes in practices in director compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to attract qualified candidates for Board service
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to reinforce our practice of encouraging stock ownership by our directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2014, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee assessed our Outside Director compensation against the median non-management director compensation for our peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this review, the Committee recommended an increase in Outside Director compensation for 2015, and the Board agreed with the Committees recommendation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016 there was no change.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The table below shows how we structured Outside Director compensation in 2016:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Members      Cash retainer: $100,000 annually, paid in four quarterly payments at the beginning of each quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted share units: Annual grant with a value of $165,000, awarded and valued on the first business day of the year Committee Chairs   Additional annual grant of restricted share units with a value of $20,000, awarded and valued on the first business day of the year Lead Director   Additional grant of restricted share units with a value of $30,000, awarded and valued on the first business day of the year Stockholder Alignment   Restricted share units are not paid out until retirement or other termination of Board service
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: New Outside Directors receive the full quarterly amount of the annual retainer for the quarter in which they join the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Their annual grant of restricted share units is pro-rated based on the date when they joined.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also reimburse Outside Directors for expenses incurred in attending Board or committee meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Restricted share units are not shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rather, restricted share units represent the right to receive a pre-determined number of shares of our common stock within 90 days following a restricted period that begins on the date of grant and expires on the date the Outside Director retires from or otherwise terminates service on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this way, they align the directors interests with the interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outside Directors may not dispose of the units or use them in a pledge or similar transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outside Directors also receive additional restricted share units equivalent in value to the dividends that would have been paid to them if the restricted share units granted to them were shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Election of Directors 2016 Outside Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than the cash retainer, grants of restricted share units and the other compensation previously described, no Outside Director received any compensation or perquisites from Kimberly-Clark for services as a director in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A director who is not an Outside Director does not receive any compensation for services as a member of the Board or any committee, but is reimbursed for expenses incurred as a result of the services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee, with the assistance of Mercer, revisited the Corporations Outside Director compensation to assess whether it still met our objectives for Outside Director compensation as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In its assessment, the Committee compared aggregate Outside Director cash and equity compensation to the median compensation of the outside directors of our peer group, as well as the structure of our compensation programs of our peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For information regarding our peer group, see Compensation Discussion and Analysis below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on this review, the Committee determined that the aggregate compensation for our Outside Directors would be below the median of our peer group in 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee then recommended to the Board, and the Board approved, changes to our Outside Directors aggregate compensation to more closely align with the median aggregate compensation of our peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, beginning in 2017 the value of the annual grant of restricted share units is increased from $165,000 to $180,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There was no change to the amount of the annual cash retainer or the additional annual grant of restricted share units paid to committee chairs or to the Lead Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of Auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is also responsible for overseeing the negotiation of the audit fees associated with retaining our independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To assure continuing auditor independence, the Audit Committee periodically considers whether a different audit firm should perform our independent audit work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, in connection with the mandated rotation of the independent auditors lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its chairman are directly involved in the selection of the new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2017, the Audit Committee has selected Deloitte & Touche LLP (along with its member firms and affiliates, Deloitte) as the independent registered public accounting firm to audit our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In engaging Deloitte for 2017, the Audit Committee utilized a review and selection process that included the following:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a review of managements assessment of the services Deloitte provided in 2016 and a comparison of this assessment to prior years reviews
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discussions, in executive session, with the Chief Financial Officer and the Vice President and Controller regarding their viewpoints on the selection of the 2017 independent auditors and on Deloittes performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discussions, in executive session, with representatives of Deloitte about their possible engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee discussions, in executive session, about the selection of the 2017 independent auditors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a review and approval of Deloittes proposed estimated fees for 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: a review and assessment of Deloittes independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Audit Committees consideration of the fact that Deloitte has served as our independent auditors since 1928, and its conclusion that this service does not impact Deloittes independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of Deloitte to serve as our independent auditor is in the best interests of Kimberly-Clark and its stockholders, and they recommend that stockholders ratify this selection.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the stockholders do not ratify the selection of Deloitte, the Audit Committee will consider the selection of other independent auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Representatives of Deloitte are expected to be present at the Annual Meeting with the opportunity
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: to make a statement if they desire to do so and will be available to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends a vote FOR ratification of Deloittes selection as Kimberly-Clarks auditor for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2.

sentences.text: Ratification of Auditors Audit Committee Approval of Audit and Non-Audit Services
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Principal  Accounting  Firm Fees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our aggregate fees to Deloitte (excluding value added taxes) with respect to the fiscal years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015, were as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) These amounts represent fees billed or expected to be billed for professional services rendered by Deloitte for the audit of Kimberly-Clarks annual financial statements for the fiscal years ended December 31, 2016 and December 31, 2015, reviews of the financial statements included in Kimberly-Clarks Forms 10-Q, and other services that are normally provided by the independent registered public accounting firm in connection with statutory or regulatory filings or engagements for each of those fiscal years, including: fees for consolidated financial audits, statutory audits, comfort letters, attest services, consents, assistance with and review of SEC filings and other related matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These amounts also include fees for an audit of internal control over financial reporting pursuant to Section 404 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) These amounts represent aggregate fees billed or expected to be billed by Deloitte for assurance and related services reasonably related to the performance of the audit or review of our financial statements for the fiscal years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015, that are not included in the audit fees listed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These services include engagements related to employee benefit plans, due diligence assistance and other matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) These amounts represent Deloittes aggregate fees for tax compliance, tax advice and tax planning for 2016 and 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approximately $220,000 and $310,000 was for tax compliance/preparation fees in 2016 and 2015, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Using the following procedures, the Audit Committee pre-approves all audit and non-audit services provided by Deloitte to Kimberly-Clark:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the first face-to-face Audit Committee meeting each year, our Chief Financial Officer presents a proposal, including fees, to engage Deloitte for audit services;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before the first face-to-face Audit Committee meeting of the year, our Vice President and Controller oversees the preparation of a detailed memorandum regarding non-audit services to be provided by Deloitte during the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This memorandum includes the services to be provided, the estimated cost of these services, reasons why it is appropriate to have Deloitte provide these services, and reasons why the requested service is not inconsistent with applicable auditor independence rules; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Before each subsequent meeting of the Audit Committee, our Vice President and Controller oversees the preparation of an additional memorandum that includes updated information regarding the approved services and highlights any new audit and non-audit services to be provided by Deloitte.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All new non-audit services to be provided are described in individual requests for services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviews the requests presented in these proposals and memoranda and approves all services it finds acceptable.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure prompt handling of unexpected matters, the Audit Committee has delegated to the Chairman of the Audit Committee the authority to amend or modify the list of audit and non-audit services and fees between meetings, as long as the additional or amended services do not affect Deloittes independence under applicable rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any actions taken under this authority are reported to the Audit Committee at its next face-to-face Committee meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All Deloitte services and fees in 2016 and 2015 were pre-approved by the Audit Committee or the Audit Committee Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of Auditors Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with its charter adopted by the Board, the Audit Committee assists the Board in overseeing the quality and integrity of Kimberly-Clarks accounting, auditing and financial reporting practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In discharging its oversight responsibility for the audit process, the Audit Committee obtained from the independent registered public accounting firm (the auditors) a formal written statement describing all relationships between the auditors and Kimberly-Clark that might bear on the auditors independence, as required by Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) Rule 3526, Communication with Audit Committees Concerning Independence, discussed with the auditors any relationships that may impact their objectivity and independence and satisfied itself as to the auditors independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also discussed with management, the internal auditors, and the auditors, the quality and adequacy of Kimberly-Clarks internal controls and the internal audit functions organization, responsibilities, budget and staffing.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed with both the auditors and the internal auditors their audit plans, audit scope and identification of audit risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed and reviewed with the auditors all communications required by the PCAOBs auditing standards, including those required by PCAOB AS 16, Communication with Audit Committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also, with and without management present, it discussed and reviewed the results of the auditors examination of our financial statements and our internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee also discussed the results of internal audit examinations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for preparing Kimberly-Clarks financial statements in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America (GAAP) and for establishing and maintaining Kimberly-Clarks internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The auditors have the responsibility for performing an independent audit of Kimberly-Clarks financial statements and internal control over financial reporting, and expressing opinions on the conformity of Kimberly-Clarks financial statements with GAAP and the effectiveness of internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee discussed and reviewed Kimberly-Clarks audited financial statements as of and for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, with management and the auditors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also reviewed managements assessment of the effectiveness of internal controls as of December 31, 2016, and discussed the auditors examination of the effectiveness of Kimberly-Clarks internal control over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the above-mentioned reviews and discussions with management and the auditors, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board that Kimberly-Clarks audited financial statements be included in Kimberly-Clarks Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016, for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also has selected and recommended to stockholders for ratification the reappointment of Deloitte as the independent registered public accounting firm for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 3.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote to Approve Named Executive  Officer Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the Compensation Discussion and Analysis that follows, we describe in detail our executive compensation program, including its objectives, policies and components.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed in that section, our executive compensation program seeks to align the compensation of our executives with the objectives of our Global Business Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To this end, the Management Development and Compensation Committee (the Committee) has adopted executive compensation policies that are designed to achieve the following objectives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pay-for-Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Support a performance-oriented environment that rewards achievement of our financial and non-financial goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus on Long-Term Success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reward executives for long-term strategic management and stockholder value enhancement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The say-on-pay vote is advisory and is therefore not binding on Kimberly-Clark, the Committee or our Board.

sentences.text: Nonetheless, the Committee and our Board value the opinions of our stockholders.

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Objectives and Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee establishes and administers our policies governing the compensation of our elected officers, including our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews our compensation philosophy annually and determines whether it supports our business objectives and is consistent with the Committees charter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee has adopted executive compensation policies that are designed to achieve the following objectives:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Objective      Description      Related Policies Pay-for-Performance Support a performance- oriented environment that rewards achievement of our financial and non- financial goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The majority of our named executive officers pay varies with the levels at which annual and long- term performance goals are achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee chooses performance goals that align with our strategies for sustained growth and profitability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus on Long-Term Success Reward executives for long-term strategic management and stockholder value enhancement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The largest single component of our named executive officers annual target compensation is in the form of performance- based restricted share units.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of shares actually received on payout of these units depends on our performance over a three- year period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Equity-based awards make up the largest part of our named executive officers annual target compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this, our named executive officers receive stock options, which vest over time and have value only if our stock value rises after the option grants are made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also have other policies that link our executives interests with those of our stockholders, including target stock ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quality of Talent Attract and retain highly skilled executives whose abilities are considered essential to our long-term success as a global company operating our personal care, consumer tissue and K-C professional businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee reviews peer group data to ensure our executive compensation program remains competitive so we can continue to attract and retain this talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These compensation objectives and policies seek to align the compensation of our elected officers, including our named executive officers, with the objectives of our Global Business Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Global Business Plan, established by our senior management and the Board, is designed to make Kimberly-Clark a stronger and more competitive company and to increase our total return to stockholders by:

sentences.text: managing our business portfolio to balance growth, margin and cash flow

sentences.text: investing in brands, innovation and growth initiatives
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: delivering sustainable cost reduction
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: providing disciplined capital management to improve return on invested capital and return cash to stockholders

sentences.text: Setting Annual Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This section describes how the Committee thinks about annual compensation and the processes that it followed in setting 2016 target annual compensation for our named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focus on Direct Annual Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In setting 2016 compensation for our executive officers, including our Chief Executive Officer, the Committee focused on direct annual compensation, which consists of annual cash compensation (base salary and annual cash incentive) and long-term equity incentive compensation (performance-based restricted share units and stock options).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee considered annual cash and long-term equity incentive compensation both separately and as a package to help ensure that our executive compensation objectives are met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation Peer Group
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure that our executive compensation programs are reasonable and competitive in the marketplace, the Committee compares our programs to those at other companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In setting compensation in February 2016 for our named executive officers, the Committee used a peer group consisting of the following consumer goods and business to business companies:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Executive Compensation Peer Group   3M   Avon Products   Campbell Soup   Clorox   Coca-Cola   Colgate-Palmolive   ConAgra Brands DuPont   General Mills   Hershey   Honeywell International   Johnson & Johnson   Kellogg Kraft Heinz   Mondelz International   Newell Brands   Nike   PepsiCo   Procter & Gamble
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee generally seeks to select companies with whom Kimberly-Clark competes for talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that we generally compete for talent with consumer goods and business-to- business companies with annual revenues ranging from approximately one-half to two times our annual revenues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Committee concluded that it was appropriate also to include certain companies outside of this annual revenue range because we directly compete with them for talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In developing the peer group, the Committee does not consider individual company compensation practices, and no company has been included or excluded because it is known to pay above- average or below-average compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee (working with compensation consultants retained separately by the Committee and the company), reviews the peer group annually to ensure that it continues to serve as an appropriate comparison for our compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of setting executive compensation for 2017, the Committee made adjustments to select companies that more closely meet the criteria summarized above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee removed Avon Products and added J.M. Smucker and V.F. Corp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Process for Setting Direct Annual Compensation Targets
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In setting the direct annual compensation of our executive officers, the Committee evaluates both market data provided by the compensation consultants and information on the performance of each executive officer for prior years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To remain competitive in the marketplace for executive talent, the target levels for the executive officers compensation components, including our Chief Executive Officer, are compared to the median of the peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To reinforce a pay-for-performance culture, targets for individual executive officers may be set above or below this median depending on the individuals performance in prior years and experience in the position.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee believes that comparing target levels to the median, setting targets as described above, and providing incentive compensation opportunities that will enable executives to earn above-target compensation if they deliver above-target performance on their performance goals, are consistent with the objectives of our compensation policies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In particular, the Committee believes that this approach enables us to attract and retain skilled and talented executives to guide and lead our businesses and supports a pay-for-performance culture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At times, the Committee may award long-term equity incentive compensation to key individuals to address retention concerns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When setting annual compensation for our executive officers, the Committee considers each compensation component (base salary, annual cash incentive and long-term equity incentive), but its decision regarding a particular component does not necessarily impact its decision about other components.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In setting compensation for executive officers that join us from other companies, the Committee evaluates both market data for the position to be filled and the candidates compensation history.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee recognizes that in order to successfully recruit a candidate to leave his or her current position and to join Kimberly-Clark, the candidates compensation package may have to exceed his or her current compensation, resulting in a package above the median of our peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO Direct Annual Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee determines Mr. Falks direct annual compensation in the same manner as the direct annual compensation of the other named executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Falks direct annual target compensation is at or near the median of direct annual compensation of chief executive officers of companies included in the peer group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The difference between Mr. Falks compensation and that of the other named executive officers reflects the significant difference in their relative responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Falks responsibilities for management and oversight of a global enterprise are significantly greater than those of the other executive officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, the market pay level for Mr. Falk is appropriately higher than the market pay for our other executive officer positions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To attract and retain high caliber executives, we pay our executives an annual fixed salary that the Committee considers competitive in the marketplace.

sentences.text: Salary ranges and individual salaries for executive officers are reviewed annually, and salary adjustments generally are effective on April 1 of each year.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From time to time, if warranted, executives and other employees may receive additional salary increases because of promotions, changes in duties and esponsibilities, retention concerns or market conditions.

sentences.text: Below we describe the three elements of performance, explain how performance was assessed for each element, and show the payouts that were determined in each case.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ELEMENT 1: CORPORATE KEY FINANCIAL GOALS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2016, the Committee chose the following as corporate key financial goals for the annual cash incentive program:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 Goal Explanation Reason for Use as a Performance Measure Net sales Net sales for 2016 A key indicator of our overall growth Adjusted EPS Consists of diluted net income per share that is then adjusted to eliminate the effect of items or events that the Committee determines in its discretion should be excluded for compensation purposes(1) A key indicator of our overall performance Adjusted OPROS After net sales and adjusted EPS are determined as described above, a multiplier based on adjusted OPROS is applied to the calculation result to determine the final payout percentage(2) A measure of margin efficiency and a helpful method of tracking our cost structure performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
